name: UIRemoteNotificationType
desc: Constants indicating the types of notifications the app may display to the user.

items.name: static var badge: UIRemoteNotificationType
items.desc: The app accepts notifications that badge the app icon.

items.name: static var sound: UIRemoteNotificationType
items.desc: The app accepts alert sounds as notifications.

items.name: static var alert: UIRemoteNotificationType
items.desc: The app accepts alert messages as notifications.

items.name: static var newsstandContentAvailability: UIRemoteNotificationType
items.desc: The app accepts notifications that start the downloading of issue assets for Newsstand apps.
